price: Bila ya shaka hayo mnayo ahidiwa yatafika tu, wala nyinyi hamtaweza kuyaepuka.
arabic: إِنَّ مَا تُوعَدُونَ لَأٓتٖۖ وَمَآ أَنتُم بِمُعۡجِزِينَ
footnotes: Na hayo anayo kuonyeni kwayo, nayo ni adhabu, na anayo kubashirieni kwayo, nayo ni thawabu baada ya kufufuliwa, na kukusanywa, na kuhisabiwa, yatakuja tu hapana hivi wala hivi. Wala nyinyi hamwezi kumshinda huyo anaye kutakeni Siku hiyo. Basi hamna uwezo wa kukataa kukusanyika wala kuhisabiwa.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: inna mā tūʿadūna laātin wamā antum bimuʿ'jizīna
